title: Oladoc Doctors Scraper
description: Extract doctor profiles from Oladoc.com. Scrape by specialty, city, and get comprehensive doctor information including ratings, experience, fees, and availability.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Optional: Start from a specific Oladoc URL (e.g., https://oladoc.com/pakistan/lahore/dermatologist). If provided, specialty/city/country are ignored.

collectDetails.title: Collect detailed profiles
collectDetails.description: Visit each doctor's profile page to extract full details including qualifications, experience, and services.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of doctors
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of doctor profiles to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to scrape.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum parallel requests. Higher is faster but can increase blocking risk/cost.

maxRequestsPerMinute.title: Max requests per minute
maxRequestsPerMinute.description: Rate limit across all requests. Lower is stealthier; higher is faster.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for Oladoc.
